title: Coin Flipper For Android Wear
summary: Simple and easy to use coin flip for Android Wear. Download now for free.

description: You have to make a decision? Start Coin Flip on your wearable. You don't have to use your cell phone. It is simple and easy to use, a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. This is the first version, we will add new features as soon as possible. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start coin flipper.Get more top apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxsPlease note:-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Coin Flip" or say "Start Coin Flipper"Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
descriptionHTML:
You have to make a decision? Start Coin Flip on your wearable. You don't have to use your cell phone. It is simple and easy to use, a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. This is the first version, we will add new features as soon as possible. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start coin flipper.


Get more top apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Coin Flip" or say "Start Coin Flipper"


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
comments: Good ðŸ’¡ still needs improvement Still to small.  Coin would look better if it were the size of the screen.  Bad implementation.  For the Moto 360.
Directions are misleading. Need to start coin flipper before you use voice commands. Directions need to be revised.
Can't get it to start with "OK, Google". Flipping works fine but it would be good if you could swipe up and down to show "this is heads", "this is tails". Then tap to flip.
Works Suggestion, Put app on phone with choices of different currency. Possibly even a his and hers option. Would come in handy with the dishes ha. Good job
Crashes on launch I tap the icon to launch it and it crashes. :/
Where to open it .hate it. Plz fix the bugs
recentChanges: - Tap on coin to throw again
